articles.title: IND vs PAK: Jasprit Bumrah says he and his family are overwhelmed by Shaheen Shah Afridi's gesture - India Today
articles.description: India pacer Jasprit Bumrah said that he and his family were overwhelmed by the beautiful gesture from Shaheen Shah Afridi after the India vs Pakistan was halted by rain on September 10. Afridi gave Bumrah a gift after he was blessed with his first child.
articles.content: Jasprit Bumrah has said that he and his family were overwhelmed by the lovely gesture from Pakistan pacer Shaheen Shah Afridi on September 10 after the India vs Pakistan match was halted due to rain.… [+1801 chars]
